texto: version of ISO/IEC 9126. Compliance was made a subcharacteristic of all characteristics, as the principles are generally applicable to all the software characteristics. The evaluation process model has been moved to ISO/IEC 14598-1. Three new technical reports are being prepared as parts 2, 3 and 4 of ISO/IEC 9126, giving examples of external, internal and quality in use metrics. 24 © ISO/IEC 2001 – All rights reserved ISO/IEC 9126-1:2001(E) Bibliography IEC 60050-191, International Electrotechnical Vocabulary — Chapter 191: Dependability and quality of service.
